Regulation Name(s): Immunomagnetic Circulating Cancer Cell Selection and Enumeration System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immunicon CellTracks Analyzer II, a semi-automated fluorescence microscope system for enumeration of immunomagnetically selected and fluorescently labeled cells.
Indications for Use Summary: Semi-automated fluorescence microscope for in vitro diagnostic enumeration of fluorescently labeled, immuno-magnetically selected and aligned cells, for use with specimen preparation equipment and reagents legally marketed for in vitro diagnostic use with this device.
